employmentId.description: The unique identifier for the employment.

employerRef.description: A unique identifier, the employer reference number.

employerName.description: The name of the employer the employee worked for.

startDate.description: The date the employment began. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DD

cessationDate.description: The date the employment ended. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DD

payrollId.description: The unique identifier used by the employer to identify the employee.

dateIgnored.description: The date the HMRC provided employment instance was set to be ignored. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

submittedOn.description: The date the custom employment was added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

ignoreEmployment.description: A boolean that will instruct HMRC not to consider an employment in the tax calculation, when set to true. The value must be true or false.

occupationalPension.description: A boolean indicating whether the employment is an occupational pension. The value must be true or false.
